JobFullDesc: Product Marketing-PowerEdge ServersJoin us as a Senior Product Marketing Advisor on our PowerEdge Server Marketing team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs a Senior Product Marketing Advisor, you will be responsible for global product marketing for the PowerEdge Extreme Scale Servers – new introductions to the server portfolio and designed for growing scale-out environments. You will work closely with a broad range of internal and external stakeholders, including Sales, Field Marketing, and Product Management, to name a few.You will:-Collaborate with a diverse set of teams across Dell Technologies, including product management, professional services, partner/channel and financial services to create an end-to-end marketing messages for your products-Create high-impact internal and customer-facing materials that clearly communicate the value and unique advantage of our servers-Develop website content to drive sales through clear, high-impact product information-Understand market trends, customer personas and the details of the evolving data center infrastructure market, as well as being the expert on competitionTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:Essential Requirements • 5 to 8 years of product marketing experience• Experience managing third-party suppliers, funding partners and full-funnel marketing activities• Good financial acumen and understanding of financial planning• Good understanding of IT technologies, vendor products and competitor offerings• Strong written and verbal communication skills• Ability to synthesize complex content into short, digestible, non-technical languageDesirable Requirements • Bachelor’s degree• Technology industry experienceHere’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era.
